body.name: The Good Home Natural Liquid Laundry Fabric Softener 64 Oz. Refill - The Good Home, Scent - Hyacinth

byLineInfo.name: Visit the The Good Home Co. Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 7 hrs 19 mins
features: FRESHNESS BOOSTER – Get the scent of summer all year round. The soothing lingering smell of Hyacinth will infuse your laundry with bountiful softness, freshness & protection.
CLEANS & REMOVES STAINS – Effectively removes stains and odors from garments and linens leaving them freshened & perfectly clean with a soothing delicious subtle fragrance.
SAFE & EFFECTIVE – See immediate results. Add some detergent and fragrance to your laundry and see/smell the difference. An experience that will keep you coming back for more.
NATURAL AND ORGANIC – All the concentrated freshness power you desire without the interference of harsh chemicals. Biodegradable, cruelty free, 100% vegan & paraben free.
PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA – We proudly bring you the quality you’ve learnt to trust. Our products are all produced in our state of the art facilities right here in the United States.
body.description: GET THE EXTRA-ORDINARY FRESHNESS YOU DESERVEExperience the ultimate in scent, softness and cleanliness for your laundry – naturally. The Laundry Fabric Softener are products exclusively found at the Good Home Company which we developed over 15 years ago. It combines our award winning fragrances with our naturally derived softener, leaving your machine washables soft scented & sparkling clean. The ultimate luxury!100% SAFE & NATURALThe exclusive natural formula is over 96% plant and mineral based; sulfate free, phthalate free and with no added silicones. This means your clothing will last longer and will not have a silicone coating left behind after washing like most major detergents. You can feel safe using our detergent and Fragrance Booster on your baby’s clothes, as well as your own. It effectively cleans and freshens, without stripping at fibers and your clothing will last longer. Most colors fade due to sulfates – which are harsh detergents that remove the colorant. Our plant based formula is gentle on the fibers, which means fabrics last longer and fade less. Our products are certified Vegan, contain no animal ingredients, are not tested on animals and we are a Green America Certified Business.MADE WITH► Plant derived ingredients► Natural essential oils► Water (aqua)MADE WITHOUT► Parabens & Phthalates► Triclosan & Formaldehyde► Artificial Colors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would highly recommend!
reviews.reviewText: Love the light and airy smell. So much more economical than other similar high end products. Works just as good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smell, not overpowering
reviews.reviewText: This brand is all around great. The smell of hyacinth is amazing. It's a refreshing smell rather than the normal lavender or fresh air scent. Buying again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really love this scent booster. A little goes a long way and it's a good thing to. It's pricey but I like it a lot and like I said a little goes a long way. And the scent lasts awhile. You'll like it. I like both the beach scent and cut grass scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better value then purchasing directly.....
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this 'fragrance' for several years now, the Pure Grass, love it! I only use it on my sheets, way too expensive for everyday laundry. The one point I'd like to leave with you is that you may pay several $$ more here at Amazon, but, you're certainly saving $33.88 that the Good Home Company charges for shipping just one of these 1/2 gallon containers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells like the beach.
reviews.reviewText: I used Beach Days laundry fragrance many years ago (but I think it was called Beach House back then), and I re-discovered it on Amazon. I adore the scent, and it is a nice way to add fragrance to a load when I use homemade laundry soap. Someone at work, out of the blue one day, said that I smelled like the beach. It took me a moment to realize it was from the laundry fragrance. It is a bit pricey, but 1/4 c. will fragrance a large load of laundry, and the house. I tried the grass scent and did not care for it. The grassy fragrance turned sweet and overbearing by the end of the cycle. I've found that the laundry fragrance has a mild softening effect on laundry that goes into the dryer, but I don't notice much difference in items that hang-dry, aside from the gorgeous scent. It is a small splurge that adds a lift to laundry day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product smells wonderful - while in the bottle. I followed the instructions, shook the container and added recommended amount to fabric softener compartment. I used fragrance free detergent so the fabric softener scent wouldn’t compete with detergent. I’ve used this twice with fluffy bright white towels. Both times they came out with yellowish splotches. First time I though I did something wrong, so paid extra close attention second time and same thing happened, it doesn’t appear to mix well with water and the towel just absorbs the amount dispensed. It does come out when rewashed, so towels aren’t ruined, but certainly a waste of time and money. Additionally the towels failed to hold the scent after dried. The liquid is a thin milky white - the stains don’t appear until after they’ve been dried. I do like the scent and wish I could purchase just the beach days detergent (currently you have to buy in a bundle with softener) I have the pure grass fragrance detergent because that can be purchased alone, that does not cause the staining like the softener does. I’ll review the detergent under that product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You will want to do laundry all day - every day!
reviews.reviewText: (This is an excerpt from my review of the two-pack)... This stuff is amazing! What it really is is aromatherapy masquerading as a fabric softener! I save a ton of money by making my own laundry detergent (thank you Pinterest!) but I miss the wonderful scent my laundry used to have. I used to love doing laundry just because the scent made me feel so good but then without any scent it just became a chore, which is probably why my laundry was always piled high in the laundry room instead of neatly folded and hung up each week. So I searched for a laundry fragrance and since the Good Home products were all I could find I decided to give it a try. This Pure Grass scent, in my opinion, doesn't exactly smell like fresh cut grass (I think it smells better!) but it does smell incredibly fresh, clean and bright the way laundry should smell. When I get my last load finished I end up wishing I had more to wash! I've been able to stay caught up on my laundry for two weeks in a row now (a feat I would normally accomplish only a few times a year). It also made our front yard smell incredible when the dryer was going so I've decided that doing laundry just before guests arrive is not a bad idea. It's a scent that makes you think of summer breezes wafting in through the white-curtained windows of a charming English cottage with flowers planted all around and birds singing and bees humming. And the fragrance REALLY lasts on the clothes, too! In the morning when I woke up and lifted the covers off of me the scent on my pajamas hit me like they were fresh out of the dryer! Get this stuff and you'll be in heaven and you'll never put off doing your laundry ever again! I also will put about a tablespoon or two of this into a spray bottle of water and use it to freshen linens and even spray it on my carpets, curtains and furniture to freshen up the house and it's great as a spray to use when ironing. (You can save money by buying directly from the Good Home website, especially if you are a first time customer because you can save 15% -click the coupons link to get the code. They also give free shipping on orders over $150. I ordered two cases as a first time customer and ended up paying twenty-five dollars each instead of the 35-40 here on Amazon.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great scent but not lasting
reviews.reviewText: Looking for a different scent to replace Tyler Diva.Bought this beach scent. It’s fantastic smelling but it takes a lot of product to get a strong smell and it doesn’t last
